meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>water</kanji> <kanji>star</kanji> is the planet <vocabulary>Mercury</vocabulary>. That's where we hid all of our secret moon water. Mercury looks enough like our moon, so we put it there so no one could find it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
